content:
InvokeWebServiceActivity Class

In this Article

Invokes a Web service through a proxy class, which passes and receives parameters as specified. This class cannot be inherited.

Syntax

Declaration

[System.ComponentModel.Designer(typeof(System.Workflow.Activities.InvokeWebServiceDesigner), typeof(System.ComponentModel.Design.IDesigner))]
[System.ComponentModel.ToolboxItem(typeof(System.Workflow.Activities.InvokeWebServiceToolboxItem))]
[System.Drawing.ToolboxBitmap(typeof(System.Workflow.Activities.InvokeWebServiceActivity), "Resources.WebServiceInOut.png")]
[System.Obsolete("The System.Workflow.* types are deprecated.  Instead, please use the new types from System.Activities.*")]
[System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Compiler.ActivityValidator(typeof(System.Workflow.Activities.InvokeWebServiceValidator))]
public sealed class InvokeWebServiceActivity : System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Activity, System.Workflow.ComponentModel.IDynamicPropertyTypeProvider

Remarks

Note

This material discusses types and namespaces that are obsolete. For more information, see Deprecated Types in Windows Workflow Foundation 4.5.

Constructors summary

InvokeWebServiceActivity()

Initializes a new instance of the InvokeWebServiceActivity class.
InvokeWebServiceActivity(String)

Initializes a new instance of the InvokeWebServiceActivity class using the name of the activity.

Fields summary

InvokedEvent

Represents the DependencyProperty that targets the Invoked event.
InvokingEvent

Represents the DependencyProperty that targets the Invoking event.
MethodNameProperty

Represents the DependencyProperty that targets the stem.Workflow.Activities.InvokeWebServiceActivity.MethodName* property.
ParameterBindingsProperty

Represents the DependencyProperty that targets the stem.Workflow.Activities.InvokeWebServiceActivity.ParameterBindings* property.
ProxyClassProperty

Represents the DependencyProperty that targets the stem.Workflow.Activities.InvokeWebServiceActivity.ProxyClass* property.
SessionIdProperty

Represents the DependencyProperty that targets the stem.Workflow.Activities.InvokeWebServiceActivity.SessionId* property.

Properties summary

MethodName

Gets or sets the method name of the proxy class that is called on the Web service.
ParameterBindings

Gets the collection of parameter bindings for the method specified by the stem.Workflow.Activities.InvokeWebServiceActivity.MethodName* property.
ProxyClass

Gets or sets the type of the proxy class used to communicate with the Web service.
SessionId

Gets or sets a session identifier that indicates whether the session is shared across an activity, or if a new session is used.

Occurs when the Web service is being invoked.

Constructors

  • InvokeWebServiceActivity()

    Initializes a new instance of the InvokeWebServiceActivity class.

    public InvokeWebServiceActivity ();
  • InvokeWebServiceActivity(String)

    Initializes a new instance of the InvokeWebServiceActivity class using the name of the activity.

    public InvokeWebServiceActivity (string name);

    Parameters

    • name
      String

      The user-defined name of the activity.

Fields

  • InvokedEvent

    Represents the DependencyProperty that targets the Invoked event.

    public static readonly System.Workflow.ComponentModel.DependencyProperty InvokedEvent;
  • InvokingEvent

    Represents the DependencyProperty that targets the Invoking event.

    public static readonly System.Workflow.ComponentModel.DependencyProperty InvokingEvent;
  • MethodNameProperty

    Represents the DependencyProperty that targets the stem.Workflow.Activities.InvokeWebServiceActivity.MethodName* property.

    public static readonly System.Workflow.ComponentModel.DependencyProperty MethodNameProperty;
  • ParameterBindingsProperty

    Represents the DependencyProperty that targets the stem.Workflow.Activities.InvokeWebServiceActivity.ParameterBindings* property.

    public static readonly System.Workflow.ComponentModel.DependencyProperty ParameterBindingsProperty;
  • ProxyClassProperty

    Represents the DependencyProperty that targets the stem.Workflow.Activities.InvokeWebServiceActivity.ProxyClass* property.

    public static readonly System.Workflow.ComponentModel.DependencyProperty ProxyClassProperty;
  • SessionIdProperty

    Represents the DependencyProperty that targets the stem.Workflow.Activities.InvokeWebServiceActivity.SessionId* property.

    public static readonly System.Workflow.ComponentModel.DependencyProperty SessionIdProperty;

Properties

  • MethodName

    Gets or sets the method name of the proxy class that is called on the Web service.

    public string MethodName { get; set; }

    Property Value

    • String

      The method name of the proxy class. The default is an empty String.

  • ParameterBindings

    Gets the collection of parameter bindings for the method specified by the stem.Workflow.Activities.InvokeWebServiceActivity.MethodName* property.

    public System.Workflow.ComponentModel.WorkflowParameterBindingCollection ParameterBindings { get; }

    Property Value

    • WorkflowParameterBindingCollection

      A WorkflowParameterBindingCollection for the method, specified by stem.Workflow.Activities.InvokeWebServiceActivity.MethodName* property. The default is an empty collection of type WorkflowParameterBindingCollection.

  • ProxyClass

    Gets or sets the type of the proxy class used to communicate with the Web service.

    public Type ProxyClass { get; set; }

    Property Value

    • Type

      Type of the proxy used to start the Web service. The default is an empty String.

    Remarks

    If this property is set when the activity is in runtime mode a ReadOnlyException is thrown.

  • SessionId

    Gets or sets a session identifier that indicates whether the session is shared across an activity, or if a new session is used.

    public string SessionId { get; set; }

    Property Value

    • String

      An identifier that either contains the stem.Workflow.Activities.InvokeWebServiceActivity.SessionID* of a previous session or an empty String that indicates that a new session will be used. The default is an empty String.

    Remarks

    If a previous <xref:System.Workflow.Activities.InvokeWebServiceActivity.SessionID%2A> is used, the session is shared.

  • Execute(ActivityExecutionContext)

    Parameters

    • executionContext
      ActivityExecutionContext

  • OnClosed(IServiceProvider)
    protected override void OnClosed (IServiceProvider provider);

    Parameters

    • provider
      IServiceProvider

      To be added.

Events

  • Invoked

    Occurs when the Web service is invoked.

    public event EventHandler<System.Workflow.Activities.InvokeWebServiceEventArgs> Invoked;
  • Invoking

    Occurs when the Web service is being invoked.

    public event EventHandler<System.Workflow.Activities.InvokeWebServiceEventArgs> Invoking;

Explicit Interface Implementations

  • IDynamicPropertyTypeProvider.GetAccessType(IServiceProvider,String)

    Returns the access type for the specified property.

    System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Compiler.AccessTypes IDynamicPropertyTypeProvider.GetAccessType (IServiceProvider serviceProvider, string propertyName);

    Parameters

    • serviceProvider
      IServiceProvider

      An object that implements IServiceProvider to provide access to design time services if they are required.

    • propertyName
      String

      The name of the property.

    Returns

    • AccessTypes

      An AccessTypes enumeration value that denotes the access level of the property.

    Remarks

    Used at compile time to validate whether the properties are correctly bound to one other. Without this interface this information is inferred directly from property getter/setters.

  • IDynamicPropertyTypeProvider.GetPropertyType(IServiceProvider,String)

    Returns the Type of the specified property.

    Type IDynamicPropertyTypeProvider.GetPropertyType (IServiceProvider serviceProvider, string propertyName);

    Parameters

    • serviceProvider
      IServiceProvider

      An object that implements IServiceProvider to provide access to design time services if they are required.

    • propertyName
      String

      The name of the property.

    Returns

    • Type

      The Type for the property whose name is passed as the propertyName parameter.

    Remarks

    Used at compile time to validate whether the properties are correctly bound to one other.
